Ebbro P-4 P407 Toyota Supra (JZA80) 2003 JGTC Series GT500 Class 13th Place J. Dufour/H. Noda/S. Ara

Purchased: 2014

Jérémie Dufour & Seiji Ara (Hideki Noda replacing Ara in round 2 only) raced for Team Advan Tsuchiya in the 2003 JGTC Series. Their best result was a 3rd place finish in round 6 at Twin Ring Motegi and they finished 13th overall in GT500 class that year. 2003 was also the 25th anniversary of the Advan brand, hence the special Advan livery on the Supra.
